thread.title: Very good value, convenient hotel
thread.title_full: Very good value, convenient hotel - Review of The Westbourne Hyde Park, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: JEBath
title: Very good value, convenient hotel
text:
Very friendly and helpful staff, good sized room with small kitchenette area (fresh milk provided together with tea and coffee). Everything needed for a weekend stay. Convenient for Paddington station (about five minutes walk) but will be even more convenient when Lancaster Gate tube station opens again in July 2017, as that's literally two minutes away. All in all extremely good, and we'll definitely be back.
Room Tip: We had room 108 which looks it onto the quiet street, huge windows See more room tips
